hook.text: IQ gets you hired. EQ gets you promoted. CQ gets you the international deal.

buildup.text: Cultural intelligence (CQ) measures your ability to function effectively across different cultures.

discovery.text: CQ has four parts: drive (motivation), knowledge, strategy (planning), and action (adapting behavior).

twist.text: High CQ doesn't mean knowing every culture. It means adapting quickly when you encounter a new one.

climax.text: CQ is trainable. Every cross-cultural interaction you study or experience raises your score.

punchline.text: You don't need to know every culture. You need to learn any culture fast.
